name: Ricetta: polpette di gamberetti dorate
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Golden Shrimp Balls.

value.name: Gamberetti
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Polpette di gamberetti dorate
value.desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.

value.text: Reward from reaching Reputation Level 1 in Liyue
